1610990.name: Distortion VR
1610990.description:
Distortion thrusts you into the heart of Cortex Central, a sprawling Cyberpunk megacity controlled by the shadowy FA Corporation. Using neural implants embedded at birth, FA Corp manipulates the population’s perception of reality, erasing individuality and free will. Their sinister "Thought Program" dictates every major decision—careers, politics, finances—turning life into a meticulously engineered illusion.

As whispers of rebellion grow, your mission is clear: uncover the secrets of FA Corporation, awaken key allies, and dismantle their central data servers hidden within their heavily fortified headquarters. But the journey is perilous, with distortions warping reality and making truth hard to find.

Explore the immersive world of Cortex Central, from neon-lit streets and dark alleyways to bustling metro stations, nightclubs, and rooftops. Take control of high-tech weapons, ranging from precision pistols to automatic rifles, and engage in high-octane action sequences.

Built from the ground up for VR, Distortion delivers a full-length campaign, endless gameplay modes, and a rich, complex story. Experience an exclusive soundtrack by Leon Switch as you navigate this distorted reality. Will you rise against the system and reclaim freedom, or fall victim to their control? The choice—and the fight—are yours.
1610990.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
